title: Watch us move (TEFC)
creator_credit: University of California, Los Angeles and Richard Beindorf
brief_description: Introduces sensory motor concepts for training preschool retarded children. Discusses a program at a day school, describing the need for sensory integration and demonstrating the effects of the program on the children. Produced by the Child Mental Health Nursing Program UCSF.
creator_credit_for_label: University of California, Los Angeles and Richard Beindorf
